output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, CMF 11240002 is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral propaganda.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions Nicolae Ciucă, a presidential candidate (Position 4).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram, targeting a broad audience (estimated 1001-5000 people).
4. Electoral objective: Yes, clear electoral objectives for both: - Parliamentary elections (which is allowed) - Presidential elections (which is not allowed after campaign end)
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party communication with CMF number.
The post violates Article 55 t) specifically because: - It promotes Nicolae Ciucă as presidential candidate after the campaign period has ended - Contains explicit electoral messaging for the presidential race - Is being actively promoted through paid advertising - Contains clear call to action for voting purposes

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Direct candidate promotion - Paid distribution - Clear electoral messaging - Explicit support for presidential candidate
conclusion.message-for-police: Partidul Național Liberal și Ucu Dima, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale pentru candidatul prezidențial Nicolae Ciucă după încheierea campaniei electorale, prin postarea cu ID 487741760321294 pe Facebook. Postarea conține materiale de propagandă electorală (conform Art. 36(7) din Legea 334/2006) fiind o reclamă plătită, cu CMF 11240002, care promovează explicit candidatul la președinție și îndeamnă la vot, difuzată după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Impactul electoral este evident prin mesajul direct de susținere și îndemnul la vot pentru candidatul prezidențial.
